citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15-10:45
AM on 13-DEC-16.Inspector honked vehicle horn, called both contact numbers and waited 30 minutes outside
driveway, as gate was locked.
Accompanied by MDA inspectors.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15-10:45
AM on 13-DEC-16.Inspector honked vehicle horn, called both contact numbers and waited 30 minutes outside
driveway, as gate was locked.  
Accompanied by MDA inspectors.
